Name: Urban Legend: The Anonymous Inviter
Description: A WavesLine message from an anonymous sender draws you into a world of urban legends, unknowns, and anomalies. Investigate, record them, or verify, debunk them... Present evidence strong enough to speak for itself.
QuestDesc: A WavesLine message from an anonymous sender draws you into a world of urban legends, unknowns, and anomalies. Investigate, record them, or verify, debunk them... Present evidence strong enough to speak for itself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's midnight. The empty garden melts into the thick darkness. A few emergency lamps flicker weakly through the branches.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just as you begin to suspect this was all a prank, a strange noise sounds right behind you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Sounds
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tick tack, tick tack—

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Sounds
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Creeeak—Tick tack—Thump, thump, THUMP…

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A cold wind seeps through some unseen crack, chilling you to the bone. Shadows stretch unnaturally long, creeping silently toward you.
You. Have. Arrived... I. Have. Been. Waiting. For. A. Very. Long. Time.

Options.PlotLineKey: (Immediately throw the figure over your shoulder.)
(Play along and fake being terrified.)
(Stay calm and stare them down.)

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: OW! OW! OW!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A girl in a Voidmatters Science uniform falls flat on her back, thanks to your seasoned reflexes. She shoots you a deeply offended look as she struggles to get up.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, oh no! What's this? Someone, help me, pleaassse!
...You're not even trying. That's, like, negative on the scare scale.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The girl pouts as she clicks off the flashlight she'd been shining under her chin.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The girl in a Voidmatters Science uniform clearly didn't expect such a calm reaction. She lowers the flashlight she was shining under her face, meeting your gaze with a hint of awkwardness.
So, uh… you showed up way faster than I expected.

Options.PlotLineKey: So you're the one who sent the texts.
What was the point of all this?

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, technically, yes. I didn't send them to just anyone. I only message people I've judged to be capable, courageous, and curious enough to face the unknown. People like you, {PlayerName}.
I've heard of you. Observed you, even. And now, finally, you answered the call.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome to the Paranormal Fan Club's... entrance trial.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me introduce myself! I'm Mayo, the new leader of the Paranormal Fan Club!

Options.PlotLineKey: So this was just about club recruitment?
Wait. Who said I was joining?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Just about club recruitment?" Excuse you! We are a premier investigative organization!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No waaaay! You'd actually turn down an opportunity this rare?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're the Academy's paranormal frontier! Legend-Chasers! Rift-Watchers! We witness the scary stuff up close!

Options.PlotLineKey: Tell the truth. What's this really about?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fine, fine… Everyone's drowning in coursework. Nobody has the time to go chasing the unexplainable anymore. The drop-off rate has been getting worse...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If this keeps up, forget becoming an official club, we'll get shut down!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So... I've sworn to gather new top-tier talents!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh-uh, I know what you're thinking, but the paranormal and science aren't at odds with each other. They're just different ways of explaining and studying the unknown. Don't you dare think that makes us lesser.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And these unexplainable phenomena? They aren't unfounded! They really exist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Something that keeps building itself from nothing? A broadcast that plays at 3 AM when no one's there? A doll that returns no matter how far you throw it? All of these have been documented, investigated, and verified by us, the Paranormal Fan Club.

Options.PlotLineKey: Okay, now things are getting interesting.
This feels like science mixed with coincidences.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: YES!! See?! You share our way of thinking! You and this club were meant to be!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that you're here, I'm not letting you escape. A talent like you? Mine now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And don't you worry! We might not be "official" on paper, but our budget and member benefits are just as good!

Options.PlotLineKey: Not a bad pitch. I'll think about it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hah! Typical science nerd!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't think for a second that we're the only ones doing the watching. The paranormal... it watches back. And you never know when it might just decide to reach out and give you a scare!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So keep those eyes wide open, {Male=Mr. Rationality;Female=Ms. Rationality}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm putting my honor as club leader and two whole months of allowance on the line! Go on, debunk them! Prove me wrong!

Options.PlotLineKey: Do we really have to go that far...?
Sure. Deal!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pay attention to sounds that shouldn't exist. Look for lights with no source. Watch for shadows that shouldn't be there. The paranormal hides in ordinary corners.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Verify or debunk their existence, and bring back solid proof of your claim.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And who knows, the next campus legend… might have your name on it.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (The Paranormal Fan Club is going to be disbanded…? What happened? Didn't Mayo say she was still recruiting? How did it come to this?)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I've gathered a lot of evidence about those urban legends... Maybe it can still help. I should go.)

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you also members of the Paranormal Fan Club?
Are you here for the disbandment event?

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah… but after tomorrow, there won't be a Paranormal Fan Club anymore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mournful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't look so upset. There's nothing any of us can do about it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mournful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every story has to end. What matters is that it gets a proper ending.

Options.PlotLineKey: Wait, does Mayo know the club is being disbanded?
Where is Mayo? She was dead set on it continuing!

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What? Mayo? You don't know? She went missing half a year ago during an urban legend field investigation.

Options.PlotLineKey: Missing? Half a year ago?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mournful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Considering how long we haven't held any activities, it's not strange that {Male=he;Female=she} didn't know… You only joined the club recently, didn't you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right, sorry. It's just… I still get worked up whenever someone mentions Mayo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She was our leader. Our heart. Her passion for the unexplained was stronger than anyone's, as was the initiative she took...

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She investigated the Midnight Train alone. She sent back the video of the Route Constructor that rainy night. Someone like her… Of course, someone like her wouldn't come back...

Options.PlotLineKey: But I've been getting messages from her recently.

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You mean the disbandment message? Oh, I sent it...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, I mean I saw her not long ago. Right here. She's the one who invited me to join.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've called each other several times. About the train, the Constructor... all the legends you just mentioned.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mournful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wh-what? You're not joking, are you?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's impossible. After she went missing, we searched for her signal everywhere. Nothing. Not a single trace. Some even think she got caught in a Void Storm… or in one of the urban legends she was chasing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Honestly, we don't know where she went. It's like she became an urban legend herself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mournful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And if she did come back, why wouldn't she come to us? Everyone's been waiting for her...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You scroll through your call history, trying to prove you're not lying. But the call list is empty. You can't even reply to her WavesLine messages anymore.

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe she didn't truly return...
Maybe she had something more important to do.
Maybe only I could see her?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Reverberations of the departed... or lingering obsessions. I've seen similar phenomena in other places.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe she didn't have the strength to do more. Or maybe she herself didn't realize… that she had already passed away.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thinking back, there were strange things about our interactions. But I don't think she was trying to hide anything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, no... I just can't accept this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mournful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But haven't we always chased the unexplained? You said it yourself... "It's like she became an urban legend herself."

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But is that even possible…?

Options.PlotLineKey: All I can tell you is that my experiences were real.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mournful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Compared to her being dead or gone forever... I'd rather believe this. If we one day solve all these mysteries, maybe we'll find her again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So... if what you saw really was Mayo... why did she come to you? What was she trying to do?

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe she couldn't let go of the club. Or of you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mournful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The club...? But we've already decided to disband it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No one talks about these legends anymore. We can't even get a decent sighting. At this rate, we'd just become an empty shell of who we used to be.

Dialogues.Speaker: Embarrassed Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'd rather end it on our own terms, while it still means something.

Options.PlotLineKey: I think… I understand why she came to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These are the records from the urban legends she guided me to investigate. Whether you disband the club or not is your decision, but if you want to continue… you can start from here.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She once told me, "Pay attention to sounds that shouldn't exist. Look for lights with no source. Watch for shadows that shouldn't be there." As long as someone is still listening, they won't disappear.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You hand over the photos and recordings you collected during your investigations.
